001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.services;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
006import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
007import org.bitcoinj.core.InsufficientMoneyException;
008import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
009import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutput;
010import org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet;
011import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.rpc.BitcoinJsonRpc;
012import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.service.SignTransactionService;
013import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.FeeCalculator;
014import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.HDKeychainSigner;
015import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.RawTransactionSigningRequest;
016import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.SigningRequest;
017import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.SigningUtils;
018import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.TestnetFeeCalculator;
019import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.TransactionInputData;
020import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.TransactionOutputAddress;
021import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.TransactionOutputData;
022import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.Utxo;
023
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.util.Collection;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.Optional;
028import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
029
030/**
031 * Transaction completion and signing service that uses a bitcoinj {@link Wallet}. This
032 * service can find available UTXOs, build and sign transactions.
033 */
034public class WalletSigningService implements SignTransactionService {
035    private final Wallet wallet;
036    private final HDKeychainSigner signer;
037    private final FeeCalculator feeCalculator = new TestnetFeeCalculator();
038
039    public WalletSigningService(Wallet wallet) {
040        this.wallet = wallet;
041        signer = new HDKeychainSigner(wallet.getActiveKeyChain());
042    }
043
044    /**
045     *
046     * @param rawRequest "raw" signing request with UTXO hash, index information only
047     * @return A (future) signed transaction
048     */
049    public CompletableFuture<Transaction> signTransaction(RawTransactionSigningRequest rawRequest) {
050        SigningRequest completeRequest;
051        try {
052            // Foreach incomplete input, find the UTXO in the wallet and make a complete input
053            List<TransactionInputData> inputs = rawRequest.inputs().stream()
054                    .map(input -> TransactionInputData.of(
055                                    findUtxo(input.toUtxo())
056                                            .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException("UTXO not found in wallet"))
057                            )
058                    )
059                    .toList();
060            // Make a (full) signing request that can be signed with a keychain alone
061            completeRequest = SigningRequest.of(wallet.network(), inputs, rawRequest.outputs());
062        } catch (RuntimeException e) {
063            return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(e);
064        }
065
066        return signTransaction(completeRequest);
067    }
068
069
070    /**
071     * @param request "complete" signing request with UTXO hash, index, amount, scriptPubKey
072     * @return A (future) signed transaction
073     */
074    @Override
075    public CompletableFuture<Transaction> signTransaction(SigningRequest request) {
076        return signer.signTransaction(request);
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Create and sign a transaction to send coins to the specified address. Implements the transaction-building
081     * and signing portion of `sendtoaddress` RPC.
082     * @param toAddress destination address
083     * @param amount amount to send
084     * @return a future signed transaction
085     */
086    @Override
087    public CompletableFuture<Transaction> signSendToAddress(Address toAddress, Coin amount) throws IOException, InsufficientMoneyException {
088        List<TransactionInputData> utxos = getInputs();
089        TransactionOutputData outputData = new TransactionOutputAddress(amount, toAddress);
090        SigningRequest bitcoinSendReq = createBitcoinSigningRequest(wallet.network(), utxos, List.of(outputData), wallet.currentChangeAddress());
091        return signer.signTransaction(bitcoinSendReq);
092    }
093    
094    @Override
095    public SigningRequest createBitcoinSigningRequest(Network network, List<TransactionInputData> inputUtxos, List<TransactionOutputData> outputs, Address changeAddress) throws InsufficientMoneyException {
096        SigningRequest request = SigningRequest.of(network, inputUtxos, outputs);
097        // TODO: see Wallet.calculateFee
098        return SigningUtils.addChange(request, changeAddress, feeCalculator);
099    }
100
101    List<TransactionInputData> getInputs() {
102        List<TransactionOutput> spendCandidates = findUnspentOutputs(1, BitcoinJsonRpc.DEFAULT_MAX_CONF, List.of());
103        return spendCandidates.stream()
104                .map(TransactionInputData::fromTxOut)
105                .toList();
106    }
107
108    /**
109     */
110    public Optional<Utxo.Complete> findUtxo(Utxo utxo) {
111        List<TransactionOutput> candidates = wallet.calculateAllSpendCandidates();
112        return candidates.stream()
113                .filter(out -> out.getParentTransactionHash().equals(utxo.txId()) &&
114                        out.getIndex() == utxo.index())
115                .findFirst()
116                .map(out -> new Utxo.Complete(out.getParentTransactionHash(),
117                        out.getIndex(),
118                        out.getValue(),
119                        out.getScriptPubKey()));
120    }
121
122    /**
123     * @param txId txid
124     * @param vout output index
125     * @return  list of matching transaction outputs (bitcoinj objects)
126     */
127    public Optional<TransactionOutput> findUnspentOutput(Sha256Hash txId, int vout) {
128        return wallet.calculateAllSpendCandidates().stream()
129                .filter(out -> out.getParentTransactionDepthInBlocks() >= 1 &&
130                        out.getParentTransactionHash().equals(txId) &&
131                        out.getIndex() == vout)
132                .findFirst();
133    }
134
135    /**
136     * @param minConf minimum confirmations
137     * @param maxConf maximum confirmations
138     * @param addresses List of wallet addresses these outputs should belong to (empty list is allowed matches all addresses)
139     * @return  list of matching transaction outputs (bitcoinj objects)
140     */
141    List<TransactionOutput> findUnspentOutputs(int minConf, int maxConf, Collection<Address> addresses) {
142        return wallet.calculateAllSpendCandidates().stream()
143                .filter(out -> out.getParentTransactionDepthInBlocks() >= minConf &&
144                                out.getParentTransactionDepthInBlocks() <= maxConf &&
145                                matchesAddresses(out, addresses))
146                .toList();
147    }
148
149    // empty collection is wildcard
150    private boolean matchesAddresses(TransactionOutput out, Collection<Address> addresses) {
151        return addresses.size() == 0 || addresses.stream().anyMatch(a -> matchesAddress(out, a));
152    }
153
154    private boolean matchesAddress(TransactionOutput out, Address address) {
155        return out.getScriptPubKey().getToAddress(wallet.getParams()).equals(address);
156    }
157}
